name: Asphalt 9: Legends
overview: Real racing. Legendary wins. Tear up the competition in the most exciting arcade racing game on Nintendo Switch™! Collect real hypercars from the most renowned manufacturers like Ferrari, Porsche, Lamborghini, and more. Customize their looks and performance before going for a spin on tracks from around the world. Whether you race solo or against real players, the experience is nothing short of legendary! • OVER 90 REAL CARS: Unlock and customize an ever-growing number of the most gorgeous and powerful speed machines on the planet. • 100+ TRACKS: Blaze across breathtaking real-world locations with dynamic features, from the roaming tornados of the American wilderness to the rocky landslides of the Himalayas. • SOLO & MULTIPLAYER: Complete events and grow your collection in the Career mode, or compete against up to 7 online opponents in various multiplayer events. • SPLIT-SCREEN: Challenge up to 3 friends to an offline multiplayer challenge anytime, anywhere! Pick one of the 42 available tracks and show them who's best. • 4 CONTROL MODES: Master the full manual controls, specially tailored for Nintendo Switch™, or try the innovative TouchDrive™ commands that streamline steering so you can focus on the fun! You can also use Tap-to-Steer or Tilt-to-Steer controls with a customizable interface. • QUICK RACE OFFLINE: Challenge your personal best while racing alone or against the AI in the Quick Race and achieve your best time on every single track, both online and offline. • WEEKLY UPDATES & EVENTS: Enjoy fresh events, new content, and exciting rewards every week!
